menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

menu.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menu.description: Pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices and melted cheese.

menu.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
menu.description: Pizza with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, and red onions.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese tossed in Caesar dressing.

menu.name: BBQ Chicken Wings
menu.description: Juicy chicken wings coated in tangy BBQ sauce and served with celery sticks.

menu.name: Buffalo Wings
menu.description: Spicy buffalo wings served with blue cheese dressing.

menu.name: Garden Salad
menu.description: Fresh mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onions with a light vinaigrette.

menu.name: Lemon Sorbet
menu.description: Refreshing lemon sorbet with a tangy flavor, perfect for a light dessert.

menu.name: Chocolate Cake
menu.description: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with a smooth chocolate ganache.

menu.name: Vanilla Ice Cream
menu.description: Classic vanilla ice cream made with real vanilla beans.
